scripts.flow:report: npx claude-flow orchestrate "Read logs from logs.txt and metrics from metrics.json. Produce a concise Markdown daily MLOps report with sections: Services health, Airflow DAGs (last run & status), MLflow runs, MinIO artifacts, and a prioritized TODO for next 24h." --agents 3 --parallel > report.md
scripts.flow:prqa: git diff --staged > pr.diff && npx claude-flow orchestrate "Review pr.diff for code quality, security basics, latency risks, missing tests/docs. Return a checklist ordered by impact and short fixes." --agents 3 --parallel > pr_qa.md
scripts.flow:docsync: npx claude-flow orchestrate "Read README.md and docs/openapi-signal.yaml. Harmonize endpoints, examples and env vars. Output README_SYNC.md with an endpoints table and clear setup steps." --agents 3 --parallel > README_SYNC.md
